name: SunShine Icarus
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can discard 1 "SunShine" card; add 1 "SunShine" Spell card from your Deck to your hand. You can send this card from your field to your GY; add 1 "SunShine" monster from your Deck to your hand, but it cannot be Summoned for the rest of the turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish this card; all "SunShine" Spell effects you activate are treated as Quick Effects until the end of your opponent's next turn. You can only use each effect of "SunShine Icarus" once per turn.
